amendment.description: At the end of division B (before the short title), insert the following: Sec. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to revoke an exception made-- ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to prohibit the use of funds provided by the Act to be used to revoke exceptions made pursuant to the rule entitled "Exceptions to Geographic Areas for Official Agencies Under the USGSA" on a date before April 14, 2017.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis, Rodney amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Davis, Rodney.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Davis, Rodney amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
